block.name: Xor
block.doc: Implements the boolean logic function out = in0 XOR in1 XOR ... XOR in(N-1). The xor function can be useful if you want to invert certain bits.

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Sets the input and output to integer (signed, 32-bit) values.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Sets the input and output to short (signed, 16-bit) values.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Sets the input and output to byte (unsigned, 8-bit) values.

param.name: Num Inputs
param.doc: Sets the number of inputs to the block.
